text: Pletvar is a village in Municipality of Prilep, North Macedonia.http://mapcarta.com/13919674 Pletvar area is the home of Pseudochazara cingovskii, the Macedonian grayling, which is only found in Pletvar, it is critically endangered. ==Demographics== According to the 2002 census, the village had a total of 22 inhabitants. Ethnic groups in the village include:Macedonian Census (2002), Book 5 - Total population according to the Ethnic Affiliation, Mother Tongue and Religion, The State Statistical Office, Skopje, 2002, p. 156. *Macedonians 21 *Serbs 1 ==References== Category:Villages in Prilep Municipality
title: Pletvar
